channel.title: Fortis - VPS Hosted ☼ 24-7 ☼ Dedicated ☼
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2h39ag9.png[/img][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111218141315/runescape/images/b/b1/King_Roald_chathead.png[/img]Welcome to the Kingdom of Fortis! I'm King Fortis, proud ruler of this land. I will be taking you on a tour of this wonderful RuneScape Private Server owned by Mark. First, let's get you some useful links...
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://fortis-ps.com/"]Homepage[/URL] [URL=http://"http://fortis-ps.com/community"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://fortis-ps.com/playnow"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/56w78aqeyqs02of/Fortis.jar?dl=1"]Download[/URL][/CENTER]
Alrighty then, time for some features.
-Fully working Fight Caves (All 63 waves) -Fully working Fight Kiln -Full Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes -Unique custom made home -Fully automated DoubleXP Weekends -Great Economy -Full Squeal of Fortune! -All pets working -Full summoning (except scrolls) -Most skills fully working -Crucible also fully working -All GodWars bosses -Full QBD and KBD -No lag or memory leaks. No dupes. -Even Grand Exchange! (Almost done!) -All Aura's Working -Custom jail -::visitjail command to see the jailed players so you can yell at them/ throw tomatoes at them for breaking rules -Custom shops -Loyalty shop -RuneStone Exchange! -RuneStones! (custom in-game currency that can be bought on our website) -Unique staff zone and donor zone -Fully working Fight Caves with all 63 waves! -Dominion tower! -Fight Kiln fully working! Must complete Fight Caves first! -Fully working QBD, Nex, Nomad, etc. -[B]And much more...[/B]
[IMG]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/b/b1/20101214153227!King_Roald_chathead.png[/img] Now on to some pictures of the server!
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/21k9tad.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/29zf0gl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/8yvpdx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/n4uzx0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/ip2gyh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111218141315/runescape/images/b/b1/King_Roald_chathead.png[/img]Oh! I almost forgot! Anyone who logs into the server within the first 24 hours of the launch (coming later this week, will announce), will receive an exclusive tradable item!
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]MORE IMAGES TO COME SOON. THERE'S LOADS OF CONTENT, JUST DON'T HAVE THE TIME TO POST A TON OF PICTURES RIGHT NOW[/COLOR].[/B]

item.title: Fortis - VPS Hosted ☼ 24-7 ☼ Dedicated ☼
item.dc:creator: @heller1122 heller1122
item.description:
@heller1122 wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Welcome to the Kingdom of Fortis! I’m King Fortis, proud ruler of this land. I will be taking you on a tour of this wonderful RuneScape Private Server owned by Mark. First, let’s get you some useful links…

[CENTER][URL=http://“http://fortis-ps.com/”]Homepage[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://fortis-ps.com/community”]Forums[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://fortis-ps.com/playnow”]Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://“https://www.dropbox.com/s/56w78aqeyqs02of/Fortis.jar?dl=1”]Download[/URL][/CENTER]

Alrighty then, time for some features.

-Fully working Fight Caves (All 63 waves)
-Fully working Fight Kiln
-Full Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes
-Unique custom made home
-Fully automated DoubleXP Weekends
-Great Economy
-Full Squeal of Fortune!
-All pets working
-Full summoning (except scrolls)
-Most skills fully working
-Crucible also fully working
-All GodWars bosses
-Full QBD and KBD
-No lag or memory leaks. No dupes.
-Even Grand Exchange! (Almost done!)
-All Aura's Working
-Custom jail 
-::visitjail command to see the jailed players so you can yell at them/ throw tomatoes at them for breaking rules
-Custom shops
-Loyalty shop
-RuneStone Exchange!
-RuneStones! (custom in-game currency that can be bought on our website)
-Unique staff zone and donor zone
-Fully working Fight Caves with all 63 waves!

-Dominion tower!
-Fight Kiln fully working! Must complete Fight Caves first!
-Fully working QBD, Nex, Nomad, etc.
-[B]And much more…[/B]

Now on to some pictures of the server!





Oh! I almost forgot! Anyone who logs into the server within the first 24 hours of the launch (coming later this week, will announce), will receive an exclusive tradable item!

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]MORE IMAGES TO COME SOON. THERE’S LOADS OF CONTENT, JUST DON’T HAVE THE TIME TO POST A TON OF PICTURES RIGHT NOW[/COLOR].[/B]
